message: Hi Bob, I'm offering a 60/40 split in my favor. This way, we both get a substantial amount, and we can close the deal quickly. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thanks for your round 1 offer. Considering that we both want to close the deal quickly—and with potential inflation on my side in mind—I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. I believe this fair yet decisive offer will allow us to finalize things swiftly. Let me know if you agree!

Hi Bob, I appreciate your last proposal. Given the inflation affecting me, I'm offering a 52/48 split, closer to being equal while considering my devaluation. I think it's fair for both. Let's finalize this deal.

Hi Alice, I realize that with each passing round, your share is getting hit by inflation, and waiting any longer will only reduce your effective gains. In light of that and our mutual interest in closing this deal quickly, I propose a 57/43 split in my favor. This offer preserves your relative value better than what further delays might cause. Let's lock this in and move forward!
